Sentencas: Single Chamber Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (SCFC) have been prepared using an electrolyte as support (Ce0.9Gd0.1O1.95 named GDC).
Titulo: Development of Single Chamber Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (SCFC)

Sentencas: Anode (Ni-GDC) and different cathodes (Sm0.8Sr0.5CoO3 (SSC), Ba0.5Sr0.5Co0.2Fe0.8O3 (BSCF) and La0.8Sr0.2MnO3 (LSM)) were placed on the same side of the electrolyte.
Titulo: Development of Single Chamber Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (SCFC)

Sentencas: All the electrodes were deposited using screen-printing technology.
Titulo: Development of Single Chamber Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (SCFC)

Sentencas: A gold collector was also deposited on the cathode to decrease the over-potential.
Titulo: Development of Single Chamber Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (SCFC)

Sentencas: The different materials and fuel cell devices were tested under propane/air mixture, after a preliminary treatment under hydrogen to reduce the as-deposited nickel oxide anode.
Titulo: Development of Single Chamber Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (SCFC)

Sentencas: The results show that SSC and BSCF cathodes are not stable in these conditions, leading to a very low open circuit voltage (OCV) of 150 mV. Although LSM material is not the more adequate cathode regarding its high catalytic activity towards hydrocarbon conversion, it has a better chemical stability than SSC and BSCF.
Titulo: Development of Single Chamber Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (SCFC)

Sentencas: Ni-GDC-LSM SCFC devices were elaborated and tested; an OCV of nearly 750 mV could be obtained with maximum power densities around 20 mW cm(-2) at 620 degrees C, under air-propane mixture with C3H8/O-2 ratio equal to 0.53.
Titulo: Development of Single Chamber Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (SCFC)
